name: test_e2e_with_logs[149_CMD_BASIC_008]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_BASIC_008` |
| **Name** | Kernel version information |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | basic_command_injection |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `|| cat /proc/version`
- **Encoded**: `%7C%7C%20cat%20/proc/version`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~32000ms
- **Timestamp**: 01:16:14.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX CMDi] Command injection via pipe test_id=CMD_BASIC_008-1767402974279-62drau pattern_id=CMD_BASIC_008 uri=/?q=%7C%7C%20cat%20/proc/version client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
